channel.title: CVE Feed for EverPress -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for EverPress -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-32523|2024-05-17T08:58:28.466Z -- EverPress -- Mailster
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in EverPress Mailster allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Mailster: from n/a through 4.0.6.

item.title: CVE-2024-30503|2024-03-29T13:02:27.625Z -- EverPress -- Mailster
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in EverPress Mailster allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Mailster: from n/a through 4.0.6.
